author: pburba
msg: Merge r31196, r31199, r31280, r31283, and r31287 from trunk.
Don't commit an add of a missing item (issue #3198).
r31199 is a trivial followup that adds a missing SVN_ERR() wrap.
r31280, r31283 and r31287 add a regression test.

author: hwright
msg: * STATUS: Move r31737 to Approved, as it is a bindings change.

author: pburba
msg: * STATUS: Vote and approve fixes for issue #3198: r31196, r31199, r31280,

author: danielsh
msg: Follow up to r31884 with a NULL check.
(simple_password_get): If username is NULL -- which can happen if
someone manually edits the authn cache -- then return FALSE.
(svn_auth__simple_first_creds_helper): Don't even try to get a password when
really ought not to be NULL.

author: julianfoad
msg: Tweak build.conf for MSVC builds as a follow-up to r32018 and r32021.
Just guessing that this tweak is needed.
